issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

components.name: Alloy
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the Alloy here.

fields.description:
Display window only once when application is installed for the first time
and then it should never show that window unless the user installs the application again.
fields.summary: Display window only once when application is installed for the first time

comments.body: Please let us know the exact steps to reproduce this issue as it is not clear from your description. Also, we need the environment information (Titanium SDK , Titanium Studio, Titanium CLI) version.

Resolving the ticket as we have not heard back from the reporter and there is not much information provided in the ticket.

We will reopen the ticket once we get the requested information.
